Private Trailbreaker - Infantry - Fortification & Defense

  1. When do I use this ability? [Source: WotC]
    You use it before the game begins. Youâ€™ll put Force Field onto Private Trailbreaker, then shuffle the rest of your deck and draw 3 cards for your opening hand.
  2. For Wave 3 Ratchet, Ultra Magnus, Trailbreaker and Wheeljack. Do you search for their related card before you draw starting hand or after? [Source: WotC]
    Before the game starts, find their related card, shuffle, then draw three cards for your opening hand.
